metadata.name: Fukinagashi blue
metadata.description:
L’NFT FUKINAGASHI (= battuto dal vento), si ispira all’omonima scultura dove le farfalle che compongono la chioma brulicante, nella dinamica del movimento si disintegrano diventando esse stesse vento, polvere colorata, respiro.

The NFT FUKINAGASHI (= beaten by the wind), is inspired by the sculpture of the same name where the butterflies that make up the swarming hair, disintegrate in the dynamics of movement, becoming themselves wind, colored dust, breath.
